description: Aligent OpenAPI Client plugin generator. This generator is used for generating type-safe REST API clients using OpenAPI 3.0 Schema files.

schemaPath.description: Absolute path to the schema. Specify a valid HTTP url or a local file.
schemaPath.x-prompt: Absolute schema path (a valid HTTP url or a local file):

importPath.description: The package name used to import the client, like @myorg/my-awesome-client. Defaults to @clients/{name} if not supplied

skipValidate.description: Skip validation in the generation process
